subject: Yankee Stadium (NYC)
Shea Stadium (NYC)
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: The highlight of Friday’s Bronx-Queens doubleheader — aside from Carlos Delgado’s nine runs batted in, of course — was the police escort across the Triborough Bridge.
snippet: The highlight of Friday’s Bronx-Queens doubleheader — aside from Carlos Delgado’s nine runs batted in, of course — was the police escort across the Triborough Bridge.
